transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji, [unintelligible] ji, [unintelligible] bol raha hu sir, namaste, abhi baat ho rahi thi na?
Customer: Ji, ji boliye.
Executive: Haan, maine apne number se aapko missed call bhi kar diya hai, woh number aap save kar lo, taki bhi koi problem hoti hai, aapko kisi se baat nahi ho paati hai, directly mujhe WhatsApp ya call kar lena, theek hai? Isme do-teen cheeze mujhe aur jaanni hai aapke sir, isme jo call aapne number dale hue hai sir, do hi number dale hai ya aur bhi number hai sir?
Executive: Ek 308 wala, ek 742, 742 wala hai, iske alawa bhi koi number dala hai aapne?
Customer: Ek aur diya hai sir. Isme bahut saare call miss hue hai sir, matlab last one month mein aap dekhoge, toh call kam se kam kitne miss hue hai, main batata hu.
Executive: Lagbhag lagbhag 20, 46 calls miss hue hai sir.
Executive: 45 pichle mahine aur is mahine abhi tak 28 calls miss ho chuke hai sir. Toh miss call kam kariye, jo bhi bahar ke call aate hai na, unko pick kariye sir. Sir, koi koi aata hai miss call maar ke chala jaata hai sir.
Executive: Haan, aise ek do milenge, toh but phir bhi koshish kariye ki miss na ho, theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai.
Executive: Okay, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has missed many calls.

- Wants to reduce the number of missed calls.



Resolution:

- Executive informed about the missed calls.

- Executive asked to pick up outside calls.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- missed calls, buyleads, subscription

seller_categories.mcat_name: Sex Toys For Men and Women
Personal Vibrators and Massagers for Women
